document_data.name: Swimstar Creek
document_data.mainbody: '''Swimstar Creek''' was a tributary of the [[Shining Stream]], which in turn was a tributary of [[Tethyr]]'s [[River Ith]]. It began in the [[Kuldin Peaks]] and divided [[Morninggold|County Morninggold]] in half. It was fast-moving but shallow and contained a breed of luminescent fish.
